title: Marketing Manager (Team Lead)
job_overview:
Onsite Training Australia is on a mission to empower 25,000 students annually by 2030—and we need a strategic Marketing Manager to lead the charge.

We’re looking for a proven team leader to take ownership of our Marketing Plan, Projects, and Paid Campaigns across social, search, and automation.

???? You MUST bring:
Hands-on Paid Social Media expertise (Meta, Google, LinkedIn).

Experience leading and delivering end-to-end marketing campaigns.

Confidence managing multiple projects with precision and ROI focus.

Strong leadership—this role is for doers who can lead teams, not just freelancers.

???? You’ll be responsible for:
Owning and executing the marketing strategy.

Managing paid ad funnels, automation, and campaign reporting.

Leading content, creatives, external vendors, and project timelines.

Reporting to the CEO and helping shape national visibility.

???? Not for you if:
You’ve never led a team or delivered ROI in a paid campaign environment.
You dont linke writing procedures or systems
You dont want to Work Australia hours 8:30am Start (AEST)

***To Be considerred for this role a 2 Minute Video of what you wil bring to the role must be included in the Application***
***Applications without this will not be considered***

This is your opportunity to shape the national footprint of a high-performing education brand.
Apply now and lead with strategy.
